text.p: True or False: If the dimension of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] is 6, then there must exist a basis of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] with exactly 6 vectors.

font.p: We are assuming that [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] has dimension 6. In order to define the dimension of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline], there must be a basis of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] containing 6 vectors.
